icebreakers.prompt: Tony, your work with crewAI seems quite innovative! What inspired you to dive into AI agents, and what do you see as the next big development in this field?
With your degree from the University of Pennsylvania and coursework in Data Structures and Algorithms, what has been the most impactful lesson that has influenced your professional journey?
I've noticed you've been sharing insights on the dynamic nature of AI products. How do you keep up with the rapid changes in the AI industry, and what trends are currently capturing your attention?
As a former NCAA athlete, how have the skills and mindset from your athletic experiences influenced your approach in the tech and AI world?
You've been involved in volunteer work with the Rare Cancer Research Program. Can you share how this experience has impacted you personally and professionally?
